thread.section_title: David Sklar & Associates Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of David Sklar & Associates Inc. | davidsklar.com
thread.title: Eric
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Eric

author: Eric
title: Eric
text:
Corrie provided me with excellent service and was extremely helpful in explaining the processes involved in a consumer proposal.
We all make mistakes and she was there to listen to me with a kind ear and to aid me in getting the proposal created. She was confident that it would be accepted, and it was! She was available for early morning meetings so as not to interfere with my work schedule. Thank you all at David Sklar & Associates.
